name: Longest Run
description:
# Problem Definition
A run is defined as being two or more consecutive positions holding the same value.
Determine the starting position of the longest run in the array.

Example array: {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6, 7, 6, 7, 8, 8, 9}

The starting position of the longest run is 12.


### Constraints:
 - Array is guaranteed to have at least 3 elements

 - Elements are guaranteed to be a non-zero positive integer

 - 0 <= Array element < 1000
